Name: Sonic 3D Blast™
About the game: Dr. Eggman (AKA Dr. Robotnik) discovers unusual birds known as Flickies that can transport to anywhere using Dimension Rings. Successfully capturing the Flickies, Robotnik turns them all into robots to help him find the Chaos Emeralds. Sonic must save the Flickies by freeing them from their robotic prison and prevent Robotnik from finding the Chaos Emeralds.
Meta Title: Sonic 3D Blast™: Jun 1, 2010, SEGA and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Sonic 3D Blast™? Check out the release date (Jun 1, 2010), developer insights from SEGA, and a complete game summary.
